oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oak Grove AME Zion Church: gravestone of Certie Walker
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oak Grove African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church and Cemetery
5667 Washington Pike, Knoxville, Knox Co., TN
Black and white photograph of a square gravestone with freehand script reading "Certie Wife of Alex Walker, Died March 1922 at Rest"
Oak Grove AME Zion Church was established in 1915.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American cemeteries -- Tennessee
Tombs & sepulchral monuments
